20110125010025.000|20110125010027.000|TR0|in November, but showed strong leadership 
20110125010027.000|20110125010028.000|TR0|in December's lame duck session.

20110125010058.000|20110125010059.000|TR0|between the inside the beltway 
20110125010059.000|20110125010101.000|TR0|establishment and Tea Party insurgents.  
20110125010101.000|20110125010103.000|TR0|Can Republicans build on their electoral 
20110125010103.000|20110125010105.000|TR0|success when they can't manage to speak 
20110125010105.000|20110125010107.000|TR0|with one voice?
20110125010107.000|20110125010108.000|TR0|
20110125010108.000|20110125010110.000|TR0|And finally, a bomb detonated at Moscow's 
20110125010110.000|20110125010112.000|TR0|busiest airport today, leaving at least 35 
20110125010112.000|20110125010114.000|TR0|people dead.  The bomb exploded outside 
20110125010114.000|20110125010116.000|TR0|the airport security perimeter, targeting 
20110125010116.000|20110125010118.000|TR0|vulnerable travelers waiting to check in.  
20110125010118.000|20110125010119.000|TR0|In an increasingly small world, is anyone 
20110125010119.000|20110125010121.000|TR0|safe anywhere at all?

20110125015013.000|20110125015015.000|TR0|MICHAEL WALDMAN, FMR. SPEECHWRITER FOR 
20110125015015.000|20110125015017.000|TR0|BILL CLINTON:  This is the last night of a 
20110125015017.000|20110125015019.000|TR0|month's long process.  They're probably on 
20110125015019.000|20110125015020.000|TR0|their 20th draft.  They're making change 
20110125015020.000|20110125015022.000|TR0|after change, and they're probably 
20110125015022.000|20110125015024.000|TR0|checking every word.  Because when you 
20110125015024.000|20110125015026.000|TR0|write one of these State of the Unions,
